metrics.maintainLevel: Maintain this level to graduate with honors

deadlines.subtitle: Important dates and deadlines to monitor

academicHistory.subtitle: Complete record of academic performance
academicHistory.noResults: No subjects found matching your criteria

gradebook.title: Teaching History & Gradebook
gradebook.subtitle: Manage grades and view your complete teaching history

sectionDetails.title: Section Details
sectionDetails.noStudents: No students enrolled in this section
sectionDetails.mockDescription: This is a mock course description. The actual description will be loaded from the database.

gradebook.noResults: No courses found matching your criteria

sidebar.title: Settings
sidebar.description: Select a category to manage preferences.

overview.title: Settings
overview.description: Manage your account, university, and academic management settings from one place.

links.customization: Customize the appearance and theme of the interface
links.profile: Update your personal information and preferences

needHelp.title: Need help?
needHelp.description: Check our documentation for help with system configuration.

categoriesPage.description: Program categories help organize academic programs into different groups. Each program must be assigned to a category. Categories are used throughout the system to filter and organize programs.

table.name: Name
table.noCategories: No categories available. Create categories to organize your programs.

dialog.title: Create Category
dialog.description: Add a new program category to organize your academic programs.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Category
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{categoryName}"?
deleteDialog.errorWithPrograms: Cannot delete category with programs assigned
deleteDialog.errorWithProgramsDescription: This category has {count, plural, =1 {1 program} other {# programs}} assigned. Please reassign them to another category before deleting.
deleteDialog.programsUsingDescription: {count, plural, =1 {There is 1 program} other {There are # programs}} currently using this category. You must reassign them before deletion.

bimestersPage.description: Bimesters are academic periods. Active status is determined automatically based on the current date. A bimester is active if the current date is within its date range.

table.name: Name
table.noBimesters: No bimesters available. Create bimesters to organize your classes.

dialog.title: Create Bimester
dialog.description: Create a new academic period (bimester) to manage your classes.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Bimester
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the bimester period "{bimesterPeriod}"?
deleteDialog.errorWithClasses: Cannot delete bimester with associated classes
deleteDialog.errorWithClassesDescription: This bimester has {count, plural, =1 {1 class} other {# classes}} associated. Please delete or reassign them before deleting the bimester.
deleteDialog.classesAssociatedDescription: {count, plural, =1 {There is 1 class} other {There are # classes}} currently associated with this bimester. You must delete or reassign them before deletion.

messages.autoActivateError: Failed to retrieve current bimester information

form.title: Create program
form.description: Complete the information to register a new academic program.

durationBimesters.label: Duration (bimesters)
durationBimesters.description: Number of academic bimesters in the program

messages.infoSelectLanguage: Select a language to display the appropriate fields.
messages.infoAutoCredits: Total credits are automatically calculated as the sum of credits from courses associated with the program.

errors.language: Select a language for the program.
errors.category: Select a category for the program.
errors.durationBimesters: Duration must be a number greater than zero.
errors.generic: The program could not be created. Please try again.
errors.codeExists: This program code already exists (in any language). Please use a different code.

messages.noCategories: Create at least one program category before adding a program.

detail.emptyCoursesMessage: No courses assigned to this program.

manageCourses.title: Manage Program Courses
manageCourses.description: Select the courses you want to associate with this program. Selected courses will be added and unselected ones will be removed.
manageCourses.searchPlaceholder: Search courses by name or code...
manageCourses.noCoursesSelected: No courses selected. Use the selector above to add courses.
manageCourses.successDescription: The program courses have been updated successfully.
manageCourses.errorDescription: Could not update courses. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete program?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the program "{programName}"?
deleteDialog.cascadeInfo: This program has {count} associated course(s). All program-course relationships will be permanently deleted.
deleteDialog.errorWithStudents: Cannot delete program with enrolled students
deleteDialog.errorWithStudentsDescription: This program has {count, plural, =1 {1 student} other {# students}} enrolled. Please reassign them to another program before deleting.
deleteDialog.studentsEnrolledDescription: {count, plural, =1 {There is 1 student} other {There are # students}} currently enrolled in this program. You must reassign them before deletion.

form.title: Create course
form.description: Complete the information to register a new course.

programs.label: Programs
programs.description: Select the programs this course will belong to (optional).

messages.infoSelectLanguage: Select a language to display the appropriate fields.

errors.language: Select a language for the course.
errors.category: Select a category for the course.
errors.credits: Credits must be a positive number.
errors.generic: Could not create course. Please try again.
errors.codeExists: This course code already exists (in any language). Please use a different code.

table.title: Course Management
table.description: View and manage all academic courses in the system.

detail.classesDescription: Manage the classes (sessions) for this course.
detail.emptyClassesMessage: No classes assigned to this course.

classForm.title: Create Class
classForm.description: Create a new class (session) for this course.

bimester.label: Bimester
bimester.description: Choose the bimester for this class

groupNumber.label: Group Number
groupNumber.description: Enter a unique group identifier for this class

messages.autoStatus: The class status is automatically computed based on the bimester dates. It will be 'open' before the bimester starts, 'active' during the bimester, 'grading' after the bimester ends until the grade deadline, and 'completed' after the deadline.
messages.noBimesters: No bimesters available. Create at least one bimester before adding a class.
messages.noProfessors: No professors available. Create at least one professor user before adding a class.

errors.generic: An error occurred while creating the class

deleteDialog.title: Delete course?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the course "{courseName}"?
deleteDialog.cascadeInfo: This course is associated with {count} program(s). All course-program relationships will be permanently deleted.
deleteDialog.classesInfo: This course has {count} class(es). All classes and their enrollments will be permanently deleted.

import.title: Import courses from JSONL
import.description: Upload a JSONL file with course information. Each line must be a valid JSON object.
import.fileRequirements: Only .jsonl files are accepted. The file must contain the fields: language, category, credits, isActive, and language-specific fields (codeEs/nameEs/descriptionEs or codeEn/nameEn/descriptionEn).

form.title: Invite professor
form.description: Send an invitation to a new professor. They will receive an email with next steps.
form.descriptionEdit: Update the professor profile and availability.

email.label: Email
email.description: We will send the invitation to this address.

phone.label: Phone number
phone.description: Optional. Helps coordinators contact the professor quickly.

isActive.label: Active in platform
isActive.description: Inactive professors will not appear in assignment lists.

errors.generic: Unable to save the professor. Try again.
errors.emailExists: This email is already registered in the system.

detail.assignedClassesDescription: Review the classes currently assigned to this professor.

deleteDialog.title: Delete professor?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently remove {professorName} and their access to the platform.

import.title: Import professors from JSONL
import.description: Upload a JSONL file with professor information. Each line must be a valid JSON object.
import.fileRequirements: Only .jsonl files are accepted. The file must contain the fields: firstName, lastName, email, isActive.

form.title: Invite student
form.description: Send an invitation to a student. They will receive instructions to activate their account.
form.descriptionEdit: Update the student's profile and enrollment data.

studentCode.label: Student code
studentCode.description: Unique identifier used on transcripts and reports.

isActive.label: Account active
isActive.description: Inactive students cannot sign in to the platform.

errors.generic: Unable to save the student. Try again.
errors.studentCodeExists: This student code is already in use.

detail.assignmentsPlaceholder: Student assignments will appear here soon.
detail.emptyGradesMessage: No grades found for this student.

deleteDialog.title: Delete student?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently remove {studentName} and their access to the platform.

import.title: Import students from JSONL
import.description: Upload a JSONL file with student information. Each line must be a valid JSON object.
import.fileRequirements: Only .jsonl files are accepted. The file must contain the fields: firstName, lastName, email, studentCode, programCode, isActive.

detail.studentsDescription: View and manage student grades for this class
detail.emptyStudentsMessage: No students enrolled in this class.
detail.gradeUpdatedDescription: The student's grade has been saved successfully.
detail.gradeUpdateErrorDescription: Could not update the grade. Please try again.

manageStudents.errorDescription: Could not complete the operation. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete class?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the class "{className}"?
deleteDialog.enrollmentsInfo: This class has {count} student enrollment(s). All enrollments will be permanently deleted.
